text: Charles Hammerman Rivkin (born April 6, 1962) is an American media executive and politician. He is Chairman and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Motion Picture Association (MPA) since 2017. Rivkin was Assistant Secretary of State for Economic and Business Affairs at the U.S. Department of State from 2014 to 2017. He also was the United States Ambassador to France and Monaco from 2009 until 2013. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to France Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
